authtoken.comment: Create your API access  token at https://pool.braiins.com/settings/access/ with limited read-only access, and not web access
backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
breakEvenGoodColor.comment: The color of the text showing the break even amount when it is met expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
breakEvenMissColor.comment: The color of the text showing the break even amount when it is not met expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
dataValueColor.comment: The color of the data field values expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
fiatUnit.comment: The three letter fiat currency unit for value comparisons
graphLineDarkColor.comment: The color to draw the top and right and background dashed lines of the graph outline expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
graphLineLightColor.comment: The color to draw the left and bottom of the graph outline expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
headerColor.comment: The color to use for the image header text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
kwhPrice.comment: The price per killowatt you pay for electricity to run the miner
kwhUsed.comment: The amount of energy used by the miner to run per hour expressed as killowatt hours.
miningBOSRewardColor.comment: The color to draw the bar for the Braiins OS reward expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
miningReferralRewardColor.comment: The color to draw the bar for any Referral rewards expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
miningRewardColor.comment: The color to draw the bar for the mining reward expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
movingAverageColor.comment: The color of the 14 day moving average line overlaying daily graph bars expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
priceCheckInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before checking the price again to use for profitability. 10800 is 3 hours
priceUrl.comment: The url that provides the pricing information from bisq marketplace
textColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use tor socks proxy for privacy.
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
